---
title: "move reports"
author: "John Little"
---

Move all the development reports to a report directory

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(fs)
library(here)
```

```{r}
whatfile <- dir_ls(glob = "*nb.html")
fs::dir_create("reports")
fs::file_move(whatfile, "reports")
```
